Party's presidential candidate

Mr. Biden's re-election campaign invested
a lot  focused on winning the support of

in South Carolina will take

OCD is
a neurological condition that causes people to have an
urge to engage in
meaningless, repetitive behaviors and thoughts
to relieve stress or
anxiety at the idea of ​​having a device inserted.  brain
to control these disorders
is not new but long-term studies are needed to be
widely applied.
Amber pent used to wash her hands until they
bled because of fear at the thought of
contamination from objects.  Every day since
childhood, such work
consumes her from 8 to 9 hours a day. In
2019, a research team at the University of
Pennsylvania implanted a device in her brain
that would record
electrical signals.  of the brain when the person is stressed,
then scientists will program the
device to react and reduce
stimulation to the nervous system.
This process takes up to 8 months, but in the end
the person sees the difference in time.  The
need to do meaningless work has been
reduced to just 30 minutes a day and the
fear of getting infected
by eating with others is now under control.
I am happy again and excited to go
out.  Besides living and being with my friends and
family, that's something I've been
cut off from for many years. The results that
person achieves will bring hope to
millions of people with OCD and even
epilepsy in the
US communities.  Communities across Asia are
preparing to celebrate the Lunar New Year. We
would like to take this opportunity to invite you to visit a
Taoist temple in northern Taiwan,
China. The temple is decorated with
world-themed coral shells.
This underwater place is known as the dragon king
's palace with the dragon image playing the
supreme role,
hundreds of courtyards and thousands of
delicately arranged shells to adorn the
walls and pillars of the
early colonial army.  In Phu Tan Bac Taiwan, a
dragon wrapped around a central pillar opens its
mouth and clutches a green pearl.
In 12 observations, the dragon is considered
especially auspicious, a symbol of good
luck, health, and wealth.
In the past, the Dragon represented the emperors. It was a
symbol of protection and auspiciousness.
Many parents wanted their children
to become dragons. So there may be
more children born this year.
The temple started in 1996
and lasted for two years. The main deity
worshiped here is Ji Gong according to
Chinese mythology. Ji Gong was a Buddhist monk who
lived during the Southern Song Dynasty. He was said
to possess great power.  supernatural or

injustice on saturday february 3 the
bolivian city of oruro came to light
with a special canavan festival of
russian row bands and dancers who participated in
creative performances  creating a vibrant festival atmosphere
for the
city. More than 5,000 musicians from more than 83 bands
in colorful sets performed
traditional Yang folk songs. The
event emphasized their proficiency in both
dancing and singing.
This year's special artists, the bands will no longer wear the
traditional red, yellow and green uniforms, but instead they
will wear each band's signature costumes,
bringing a new appeal to the band.  The
Caravan oruro festival event or
Anata originates from the ancient Yo festival
organized by the indigenous people of Uruguay who flocked to
the city to honor the gods protecting
W C after the Spaniards banned the festivals.  The
indigenous celebration of the 17th century event
merged with Christianity for a
celebration that remains deeply Andean Indian

Binh Duong Provincial Police
discovered more than 15,800 bottles of foreign wine without
legal invoices and documents.
Through understanding the situation, the Economic Police Department
coordinated with the market management team
No. 2 of the Department of Market Management.
Binh Duong Provincial School conducted an inspection of three trucks
parked in an empty lot in
Binh Hoa Quarter, Binh Nham Ward, Thuan An
City, Binh Duong Province. Through
inspection, the authorities discovered
that three trucks had  15,818 items were of
foreign origin but did not have
documents proving
legal origin. The total value of the goods and the
estimated amount of money was estimated at over 15 billion VND through the
work the truck drivers
declared.  hired as a driver to transport
foreign alcohol and smuggled sugar from
Long An, Binh Phuoc provinces to Binh
Duong province for distribution to provinces and cities for
consumption. The functional forces have made a
record to seal all the contents.
In order to continue investigating and
clarifying the border guards of Lao Bao International Border Gate, the
province has just handed over a
drug trafficking suspect from Laos to
Vietnam to the provincial police.
Accordingly, on the afternoon of January 29 in  At
Lao Bao international border gate, the
authorities discovered Nguyen Thanh Hung, 50
years old, residing in Thien Hue province, traveling on
a passenger bus from Laos to Hue, showing many
suspicious signs, so they checked and
discovered the man's pocket.  There were 2020
pink tablets. Initially, the suspect
confessed that these tablets were synthetic drugs
transported from Laos to Vietnam
to receive a salary of 20 million VND. Currently, the
Lao Bao International Border Gate border guard station
has been completed.  Adjust the file to prosecute the criminal case
and hand over the suspected suspect to the
provincial police for further
investigation and handling in accordance with the
law. This afternoon, a fire broke out at a
tape factory in the commune.  Vinh Loc B,
Binh Chanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, a
billowing column of smoke rose dozens of
meters high. About 13 hours, the tape factory
on streets 1A and 1A, Vinh Loc B commune
suddenly caught fire. There were no workers at this time.  The
work of extinguishing the fire on the
spot was not carried out in time. A few
minutes later, the fire covered the entire factory area of
hundreds of square meters because it
contained plastic glue and flammable substances, so the
fire erupted into a fiery red column of smoke.  A landmark
tens of meters high threatened
surrounding houses and factories. Upon receiving the report, the
fire prevention police of Binh
Chanh district and Binh Tan district sent fire engines
and dozens of officers and soldiers to the
scene because the scene was located deep inside.  In the
process, the access work encountered many difficulties.
About 30 minutes later, the fire was
controlled without leaving the village. Initially, it was
determined that the fire did not cause any loss of
life, but the entire factory collapsed and
many properties burned to the ground on the
4th.  In February, Binh Son district police in
Quang Ngai announced that they had destroyed
the point of transporting
large inter-provincial explosives during Tet, thereby confiscating
hundreds of kilograms of
explosives. Before that, Binh Son district police
discovered and caught the suspect red-handed.  Statue of Nguyen Ngoc
Dung, 52 years old, had the act of
illegally storing and transporting explosive materials while
driving a private car from Thien Hue
to Quang Ngai. The confiscated material on the car was 500
kp of explosives. The search was extended at the suspect's house.  According to the
discovery of 179 kg of explosives, it is known that the
subject Nguyen Ngoc Dung confessed to buying the
above illegal explosive materials and reselling them
to people who wanted to buy and use
seafood during
Tet. This afternoon, there was an accident.
Serious traffic happened in Di
An city of Binh Duong province between a motorbike and a
truck and a woman
died. At around 2:15 p.m., a
31-year-old woman from Soc Trang was riding a motorbike on
My Street.  Phuoc Tan Van was heading from
Di An city to the capital city of line 1. When
reaching the section passing through Tan Binh ward, there was a
collision with a truck traveling in the same direction on the
left, causing the girl to fall onto the
road and be crushed to death by the truck's wheels.  The
truck driver then went to the
ward police station. The authorities were
present to regulate traffic, examine
the scene and investigate the cause of the
incident. Our 60-hour program today
is over.  Thank you for your
